parameters.query:
-- Buscar fontes que precisam ser verificadas
SELECT 
  s.id,
  s.platform,
  s.platform_id,
  s.platform_url,
  s.platform_metadata,
  s.check_frequency_hours,
  s.last_checked_at,
  s.total_items_found,
  c.name as creator_name,
  c.handle as creator_handle
FROM sources s
JOIN creators c ON s.creator_id = c.id
WHERE s.monitoring_status = 'active'
  AND (
    s.next_check_at IS NULL 
    OR s.next_check_at <= NOW()
  )
ORDER BY s.last_checked_at ASC NULLS FIRST
LIMIT 10;

-- Enfileirar sync para cada fonte
SELECT enqueue_job(
  'sync_source'::job_type,
  5,
  {{ $json.sourceId }},
  NULL,
  NULL,
  '{"scheduled_check": true, "max_videos": 10}'::jsonb,
  'youtube_data'
) as job_id;

-- Estatísticas do sistema
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sources WHERE monitoring_status = 'active') as active_sources,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM videos) as total_videos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM videos WHERE analysis_status = 'completed') as analyzed_videos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM job_queue WHERE status = 'pending') as pending_jobs,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM job_queue WHERE status = 'processing') as processing_jobs,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM job_queue WHERE status = 'failed' AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours') as failed_jobs_24h,
  (SELECT SUM(tokens_used) FROM video_analysis WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours') as tokens_used_24h;

-- Limpar jobs antigos completados (manter 7 dias)
DELETE FROM job_queue 
WHERE status = 'completed' 
  AND completed_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days';

-- Limpar logs antigos (manter 30 dias)
DELETE FROM activity_log 
WHERE created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days';

-- Resetar rate limits expirados
UPDATE api_configs
SET 
  current_minute_count = 0,
  minute_reset_at = NOW() + INTERVAL '1 minute'
WHERE minute_reset_at < NOW();

UPDATE api_configs
SET 
  current_day_count = 0,
  day_reset_at = NOW() + INTERVAL '1 day'
WHERE day_reset_at < NOW();
